sn22.100:1.3: Pubba koti na pannayati avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam sandhavatam samsaratam.
sn22.100:1.4: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, sa gaddulabaddho dalhe khile va thambhe va upanibaddho. So gacchati cepi tameva khilam va thambham va upagacchati; titthati cepi tameva khilam va thambham va upatitthati; nisidati cepi tameva khilam va thambham va upanisidati; nipajjati cepi tameva khilam va thambham va upanipajjati.
sn22.100:1.5: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano rupam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati.
sn22.100:1.9: vinnanam ‘etam mama, esohamasmi, eso me atta’ti samanupassati.
sn22.100:1.10: So gacchati cepi ime pancupadanakkhandhe upagacchati;
sn22.100:1.14: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, abhikkhanam sakam cittam paccavekkhitabbam:
sn22.100:2.1: Dittham vo, bhikkhave, caranam nama cittan”ti?
sn22.100:2.3: “Tampi kho, bhikkhave, caranam nama cittam citteneva cittitam. Tenapi kho, bhikkhave, caranena cittena cittanneva cittataram.
sn22.100:2.4: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, abhikkhanam sakam cittam paccavekkhitabbam:
sn22.100:3.1: Naham, bhikkhave, annam ekanikayampi samanupassami evam cittam yathayidam, bhikkhave, tiracchanagata pana.
sn22.100:3.2: tepi kho, bhikkhave, tiracchanagata pana citteneva cittita, tehipi kho, bhikkhave, tiracchanagatehi panehi cittanneva cittataram.
sn22.100:3.3: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, abhikkhanam sakam cittam paccavekkhitabbam:
sn22.100:4.1: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, rajako va cittakarako va rajanaya va lakhaya va haliddiya va niliya va manjitthaya va suparimatthe phalake va bhittiya va dussapatte va itthirupam va purisarupam va abhinimmineyya sabbangapaccangim;
sn22.100:4.2: evameva kho, bhikkhave, assutava puthujjano rupanneva abhinibbattento abhinibbatteti, vedananneva …pe… sannanneva … sankhareyeva … vinnananneva abhinibbattento abhinibbatteti.
